Has there been any user abuse of the crossing in the last year
Provide any additional information, such as history of abuse, effect of any mitigation measures that have been installed
What is the type of crossing surface? (Tick which on applies)
Type of decking enter either Timber, Concrete, Rubber or Other (describe):
Type of decking Other (describe):
Is the decking wide enough for all user types?
Does the decking have a non slip surface?
What is the traverse time from decision point to 2M past the further rail (s) for Pedestrians
Has the traverse time been increased by 50% due to vulnerable users using the crossing?
Notes on traverse time
How often does a second train pass the crossing within 20 seconds of the first train
What is the chance that a second approaching train would not be seen until the first train has passed
Has there been or is there planned or apparent any development near the crossing which may lead to a change or increase in use such as a housing estate or change in farming practice
Notes on new developments

Are there any adjacent sources of light/noise (e.g. Road, Industrial Site, Airport) that could affect the crossing users ability to see or hear an approaching train?  (If yes note type and issue in Notes section.)
Are the signs for the crossing located?  (If not directly on the route a crossing user would use, make note in Notes section.)
